tables.name: UserSession

columns.name: sessionId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserSession ADD COLUMN sessionId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: accountId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserSession ADD COLUMN accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: renewedTimeMs
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserSession ADD COLUMN renewedTimeMs FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: data
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE UserSession ADD COLUMN data BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE UserSession (sessionId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, renewedTimeMs FLOAT64 NOT NULL, data BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL) PRIMARY KEY (sessionId ASC)
